QuestData.Title: Get the Key
QuestData.Description: $C, the key to my shackles is hanging around the neck of Instructor Hroegar outside.$B$BPerhaps you could retrieve it by separating his head from his shoulders?
QuestData.LogDescription: Vaelen the Flayed at Ufrang's Hall has asked you to retrieve the Key to Vaelen's Chains.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $r. Just hand me the key, I'll take care of it myself.
